CustomField.description: If Per Event, then quantities will be calculated as per the whole event, e.g. with a factor of 1. If Per Person, then quantities will be calculated by multiplying by number of attendees. VALUE OPTIONS ARE FIXED BY DELPHI.FDC AND SHOULD NOT BE MODIFIED.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If Per Event, then quantities will be calculated as per the whole event, e.g. with a factor of 1. If Per Person, then quantities will be calculated by multiplying by number of attendees. VALUE OPTIONS ARE FIXED BY DELPHI.FDC AND SHOULD NOT BE MODIFIED.
CustomField.label: Quantity Calculation
